body_html: @samjabrahams great work on this. we could be interested to contribute more also as part of my course (@oxford Data Science for IoT) - has there been more updates re the TF on Pi? also .. does this come under the TF embedded / mobile tensorflow umbrella? finally which use cases are you considering for Pi(ex image or beyond) many thanks! Ajit
